review: Its decent. but the reception over WIFI is weaker than i would like. I sent it back for the Fire TV box because it has an Ethernet port.

review: The Amazon Fire TV stick offers so many movies and apps! Its easy to set up and even though I can take it from one room to the next, I purchased another for the living room so that other members of my family may watch other shows and movies of their choice while I'm watching mine. I bought one for my son in Florida as well and he loves it.  It's perfect. I'd recommend the Amazon Fire TV stick. Shipping was fast, It's affordable, and with 8GB it can't be beat! Love it!!!
author: Karen C. "KayCee"
